resources.string: If your device isn\'t rooted, you can manually grant the required permission by executing the following ADB command from your PC (the command is one line) \'adb shell pm grant com.tomerrosenfeld.tweaksforgo android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS\' Once you have done that, the app should work properly.
adb shell pm grant com.tomerrosenfeld.tweaksforgo android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
Share the command to send it to your PC or a nerdy friend
ADB? How do I do that?
Ваше устройство должно иметь root доступ для использования этой функции
Get notifications about new Pokemon around you. Click here to configure the notifications

Click the first option in the floating menu to show a black view over the screen to save battery and disable touches. Recommended for devices with AMOLED screens. Hide the overlay by double tapping the screen.
Dim screen when overlay is active
Use the proximity sensor to detect if overlay will be shown
Экран всегда включен, пока вы играете в игру
Запускать экономию батареи автоматически при старте игры (требуется root доступ)
Kill background processes when the game is launched to save battery and improve the apps performance (Recommended for devices with less than 2GB of ram)
Make the display monochrome and set the location mode to battery saving to reduce battery consumption. Very recommended for AMOLED devices.
Maximize the screen brightness when the game start for better outdoor visibility
Show a floating menu to toggle overlay and access handy links
Turn off the display when you put the device in your pocket or cover the proximity sensor to save battery. (only for Android 5.0+)
Выберите положение плавающего меню на экране
Show a persistent notification to keep the app running in background
Эта функция доступна только для платящих. Пожалуйста, внесите небольшое пожертвование, чтобы открыть эту функцию и мотивировать меня на развитие проекта :)
